attributes.action: Cede English rule to the Scottish Parliament or Welsh Assembly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scottish and Welsh legislatures are people-centric unlike the English parliament which panders to business and the successors of the Norman invasion. It is in the interest of the English people to be ruled by those who truly have the interests of the electorate at heart.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
